name: Castle (Season 6)
summary:
4年的时间，81集案件以及一次濒临死亡的经验之后，Kate Beckett警官（Stana Katic饰）才终于和畅销书作家Richard Castle（Nathan Fillion饰）在感情上同步而走到了一起。但他们有一个不得不面对的现实就是纽约警局一个不成文的规定：不允许同事之间谈恋爱。怎么隐藏二人的甜蜜在稍后的剧情中更为棘手，周末Castle拐带Beckett来到他汉普郡的别院，想过二人世界，结果谋杀案如影随形纠缠着他们。不过外因可不是纠缠他们的唯一问题来源。Andrew说：“他还是那个长不大的老男孩，她呢，又个性执拗，他们还有很多事情需要相互磨合，有很多的小秘密要一点点坦白。”
（简介转自豆瓣）

eps.name: Valkyrie
eps.desc: (Part 1) Beckett gives Castle the answer to his very important question, and agrees to marry him, but also moves to DC for her new job. After 6 weeks, Castle heads to DC to surprise her since he has not seen her in a while. Castle wants to help Beckett with her case but unfortunately it is classified. Castle manages to get in the case after one of the photos falls out of Beckett's files, but is taken into custody and treated like a co-conspirator while Beckett is lectured on having an interfering fiance. Castle returns home to find out that he is in more trouble, as he was exposed to a chemical agent and now Beckett is trying to save his life and has only a day to live.

eps.name: Dreamworld
eps.desc: (Part 2) Beckett races against time to save Castle, as he has less than 24 hours to live after being poisoned from a chemical that was in the ventilation system of a car. Beckett and her partner must find the guy that stole the poison in order to save Castle in time with the antidote.

eps.name: Need to Know
eps.desc: Beckett's still in D.C. A new detective has been assigned to the 12th, NYPD Detective Frank "Sully" Sullivan, so Castle sneaks into the precinct to help Esposito and Ryan investigate the murder of a former child star. But before much can be done, and without explanation, Beckett and McCord show up and take over the case.

eps.name: Number One Fan
eps.desc: Castle is called in to negotiate a hostage crisis involving a murder suspect who will only speak to him, and puts his life in danger when he exchanges himself for two of the hostages. Gates allows Beckett, fired from her federal job, to assist with the investigation, even though budget cuts have prevented her reinstatement to the precinct.

eps.name: Time Will Tell
eps.desc: The initial suspect in a grisly murder, Simon Doyle (Joshua Gomez), claims to be a time traveler from the future who has come back to prevent a disaster. Castle is intrigued while Beckett is dismissive, but their investigation eventually leads them to the true killer, and events begin to play out eerily similar to Simon's stories.

eps.name: Get a Clue
eps.desc: There has been a murder in which the body of the victim is kept in crucifixion position in an alley with medieval symbols etched into her hand. On investigation Castle suggests that the murder might be to hide secrets of medieval times. But Beckett prefers to follow evidence rather than Castle's made up fantasies. But as evidence unfolds, Castle turns out to be correct with his theories as they unravel secrets of The Freemasons from a letter by Theodore Rose, a Freemason & George Washington's friend & find a hidden treasure which leads them to the murderer.

eps.name: Like Father, Like Daughter
eps.desc: Alexis and a professor are investigating the case of a man on death row in Pennsylvania, and when his exoneration is denied, with only three days until the sentence is carried out, she enlists Castle's help, even though she is still angry at him. When they begin to dig into the case, they encounter resistance from the townspeople, but with help from Beckett and the team, they uncover details that the local police overlooked, and find that the situation is much more complicated than it looked.

eps.name: A Murder is Forever
eps.desc: Castle and Beckett investigate the murder of a popular couples' and relationship therapist. At first they believe the killer might have wanted her high-profile client list. After further investigation it seems that he was after a rare, pricey object in her possession, though.

eps.name: Disciple
eps.desc: A murder victim is found hanging by her neck with a fishing hook and she bears an exact resemblance to Lanie. Investigation soon leads to another victim who resembles Esposito. The only connection between the two victims is a plastic surgeon, who apparently has no motive. Castle believes this has something to do with 3XK, whom everyone but himself believes dead.

eps.name: The Good, the Bad and the Baby
eps.desc: A man stumbles into a church carrying a baby boy before dying from gunshot wounds. When Beckett's team investigates, they discover that the victim was involved in a hostage situation and rigging the lottery.

eps.name: Under Fire
eps.desc: The team searches for a murderous arsonist when it's learned that the victim of a building fire was shot to death. Meanwhile, Ryan's wife Jenny (Juliana Dever) goes into labor, as he and Esposito become trapped in the latest fire.

eps.name: Deep Cover
eps.desc: Jackson Hunt (James Brolin) returns to New York City with a mission to locate an Iranian intelligence officer. Disavowed by the CIA, he becomes the prime suspect in the murder of a computer hacker, with the investigation being led by Beckett.

eps.name: Limelight
eps.desc: The 12th Precinct takes the case of Mandy Sutton (Alexandra Chando), a teenage pop star whose rise to fame brought with it media attention. Meanwhile, Beckett experiences the perils of being married to Castle first-hand when her newfound celebrity status makes their relationship a target for the tabloids.

eps.name: Dressed to Kill
eps.desc: Castle and Beckett investigate a murder in the competitive world of high-end fashion, after magazine editor Matilda King's (Frances Fisher) assistant is found dead.

eps.name: Smells Like Teen Spirit
eps.desc: Castle and Beckett are called in when a viral video is posted on the internet that seemingly shows a teenage girl (Hannah Marks) committing a murder by telekinesis.

eps.name: Room 147
eps.desc: What starts out as a straightforward murder case takes a turn towards the perplexing when three people all confess to the crime - and while all three know details of the murder that only the killer could know, each exonerates the others. Meanwhile, Alexis struggles with her guilt and her newfound independence after her relationship with Pi breaks down.

eps.name: In the Belly of the Beast
eps.desc: Beckett is recruited for a dangerous undercover operation with the aim of stopping a near-mythical drug baron. With no support, no intelligence and no Castle, she must unravel a conspiracy that leads all the way back to Senator William Bracken and his bid to become President of the United States.

eps.name: The Way of the Ninja
eps.desc: A Japanese woman named Jade is killed while looking for those responsible for her parents' deaths when she was young. Castle finds the murder weapon, but it is taken out of his hand by a ninja. The investigation leads them to a Mr. Saito, who is affiliated with the yakuza. He is killed and Castle and Beckett would also have been killed, but they are saved by Jade's sister, Saya, the ninja. The killer was an American contractor for the yakuza.

eps.name: The Greater Good
eps.desc: A 9-1-1 call leads the team to a Wall Street broker's body. The caller works for the U.S. Attorney's office, alongside Gates' sister Elizabeth. The victim was their insider, investigating his boss. He made a $25 million wire transfer, given to him by his boss, and planned to take the money home to Venezuela. However, Elizabeth's partner believed the brokerage still needed investigating and killed him for "the greater good".

eps.name: That '70s Show
eps.desc: Construction workers unearth the remains of 1970s crime boss Vince Bianchi. His consigliere, Harold Leon (Jon Polito), is now senile and thinks it is still 1978. The detectives, with Martha's assistance, must re-create the era in costume and attitude so that Harold will fully cooperate in the cold case. Harold reveals he and Vince shared a secret that factored into his boss's death.

eps.name: Law & Boarder
eps.desc: A competitive skateboarder's murder is investigated, which points to the unexplained death of a young boy in the past.

eps.name: Veritas
eps.desc: Once again, Beckett follows up on her mother's murder. The man known as "Mr. Smith", believed to have died in the hospital long ago, returns to tell her and Castle of a tape implicating Senator Bracken in numerous crimes, including the death of her mother.

eps.name: For Better or Worse
eps.desc: With Bracken in custody and a light caseload, Beckett turns her attention to putting the finishing touches on her wedding ceremony - but what starts as a comedy of errors, with the discovery that Beckett was, and still is, married after a drunken night in Las Vegas fifteen years ago turns to tragedy when Castle's car is run off the road by an unidentified assailant, leaving him trapped in the fiery wreck.
